thread.title: Nashville Man Who Stopped Shooter Says He’s Not a Hero

author: Joe Barrett
title: Nashville Man Who Stopped Shooter Says He’s Not a Hero
text:
James Shaw Jr. was hiding behind a swinging door in a Nashville area Waffle House early Sunday morning when he had to make a choice. A gunman, who would eventually kill four people, fired though the door, grazing Mr. Shaw’s arm.
Since the door didn’t lock, the 29-year-old Nashville native and AT&T employee had to either act or be killed.
“If...
